title: Positive play discussion
body:
Hey everyone,

You might remember Lyte's [post](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/rewards-positive-play) the other day about positive player behaviour.

We want to spend some time highlighting the awesome behaviour in our community. If you’re a positive player in League, and are OK sharing your chat logs with the rest of the community, please post a reply here!

If you do, make sure you’ve verified your email account, because you may see another bonus head your way in the near future.

replies.body: I like to think that I am a positive influence for my team the majority of the time. My favourite experience is in one of my Lulu solo q ranked games I was called #inspirationlulu for typing encouraging messages to our jungler who kept threatening to afk throughout the game. There are still a few times that I do lose my cool, particularly after being called an autist or a downy (which really should not be used as insults). I try my hardest to be adorable and positive like lux and lulu :D
oh boy lets find out if I'm a positive player or not.

> oh boy lets find out if I'm a positive player or not.

Hi GoldenTomat0,

From your chat logs you look like a positive player I would want to have as my jungler. You share your buffs often and give advice to others when they ask for it. You also share your plans ahead of time for lanes to be able to prepare for your arrival. On top of that you don't hesitate to compliment other players that are doing well, regardless of what team they are on.

Some of the chatlogs:

EDIT: removed some of the chatlogs to make it clearer and easier to read.

GoldenTomat0 (0:52): i'll camp top
GoldenTomat0 (1:07): fid get a zhonyas at least
[...]

[...]

[...]

*********** [All] (34:50): no worries team


Thanks for being a positive player and good luck on the Rift!
This sounds like fun :P Count me in, hopefully I'm positive.... o.O

> This sounds like fun :P Count me in, hopefully I'm positive.... o.O

Hi HenryPurcell,

You don't always talk, but when you do, it's positive. I would definitely say you're a positive player. 

henrypurcell (1:48): lulus so slow ><

henrypurcell (4:39): dont htink so

henrypurcell (6:31): river warded

henrypurcell (7:38): brb

henrypurcell (13:46): sorry ><

henrypurcell (14:08): "psl" :P

henrypurcell (24:45): gj

henrypurcell (38:43): sorry guys ><


Good job and good luck on the Rift!
I'm pretty quiet so I dunno how well this'll go for me. What the heck bring it on Rito

> I'm pretty quiet so I dunno how well this'll go for me. What the heck bring it on Rito

Hi Alictron,

You are pretty quiet indeed... most of your chats are pretty empty, but you're polite when you talk and usually say GG at the end of every game. 

Chat logs:

Alictron [All] (22:20): gg

Good job and good luck on  the Rift!

PS: Also good job on that Leona flash teleport. People keep telling me it's not a thing. Thanks for helping me prove them wrong!
You can post some of mine.

get #lyteUp

> I'd be interested in seeing my chat logs to see if I'm positive or not.

Hi Fuse,

You're the kind of player that is cool to have on your team because you're always congratulating your team mates. You're always there to give someone a pat on the back when they've done well and you always say good game to the other team.

I also wish I could play Nami as well as you can!
I don't know that I'm always positive, but I try. Sometimes I think I get drawn into arguments, or make off comments. But, I would love to find out whether I'm positive enough by Riot's standards.

> I don't know that I'm always positive, but I try. Sometimes I think I get drawn into arguments, or make off comments. But, I would love to find out whether I'm positive enough by Riot's standards.

Hi Keltaklo,

I really like how positive you are towards your team mates and the opposition. You're quick to tell someone they're doing well, even if it's an enemy that just knocked you down. It's also really cool how you always say gg every game no matter what.


Keltaklo (1:38): no clue
Keltaklo (4:03): all u
Keltaklo [All] (12:00): i suck
Keltaklo (29:11): i tried
Keltaklo (29:13): lol
Keltaklo [All] (31:49): you made my laning phase a living nightmare! :D
Keltaklo [All] (31:54): you are doing well
Keltaklo [All] (33:23): ggwp


I also don't know what to make of this, but I do like the cut of your roleplay jib!


Keltaklo (18:29): you are knife cat
Keltaklo (18:35): I am spear cat

Overall you seem like a great person to have on your team! Keep it up!
knife cat= rengar and spear cat= nidalee :P
This sounds like a cool idea! Can't wait to see :)
I try to be positive but I'm secretly raging at my screen half the time...
I'm game.

> I'm game.

Hi CarrotColossus,

You're usually pretty quiet in game, but don't hesitate to talk when a teammate needs help. You're also very understanding when things don't go as planned for someone on your team. There is a lot of "gj", "ty" and "it's k" in your logs. Having a teammate like you is awesome.

carrotcolossus (1:25): thanks
carrotcolossus (2:01): ty
carrotcolossus (4:06): gj

carrotcolossus (6:05): got ult

carrotcolossus (13:32): on the third one you should be able to jump over the wall
******* (13:56): oh okay
******* (14:46): yaay
******* (14:49): got it :d
******* (15:37): ty noc :)

Good job and good luck on the Rift!
Sure, why not. Also why does it say that I can't post unless I am lvl 1?

> Sure, why not. Also why does it say that I can't post unless I am lvl 1?

Hi ChainWarrior,

You stay focused on the game and don't hesitate to acknowledge when you make mistakes or when others do well, regardless of which team they are on. You also stay level headed when others are flaming you. 

Also, your Warwick rocks. 


ChainWarrior (0:17): is spelltheif still good for mid?

ChainWarrior (4:38): mm

ChainWarrior (8:34): ward river

ChainWarrior (9:51): oom

ChainWarrior (10:07): gj ty

ChainWarrior (12:14): my bad

ChainWarrior (13:57): gj

ChainWarrior (20:00): gj

********* (23:09): gj guys

ChainWarrior (26:39): regroup

ChainWarrior (27:13): nice hook

ChainWarrior (30:39): gg

Thanks for being a great teammate and good luck on the Rift!

EDIT: I forgot to answer your question about "can't post unless I am lvl1". This looks like a bug. I'll escalate it to the team that is in charge of the Boards. Thanks for raising the issue.

I know I struggle sometimes to keep my cool.

I'm game to know if I meet the standards :D

(I want to be a better person to play alongside!)

EDIT: I feel overall I'm a fairly decent person to play alongside currently!

Never been muted/banned been playing since end of S1.

The most negative you will see is telling others not be negative (well thats what im expecting :| )


EDIT: Did i get skipped Toast?

it would be quite effective if Rito reduced lp gain/increase lp loss of toxic players, or reduced the number of games lost in a row to drop divisions/tiers, not by so much that they would constantly drop to bronze, but enough so, so that they would at least pretend to be nice in game
I hope my positive team work ribbon has some truth too it c:
I haven't swore once in a any of my matches or blamed a team mate :o ,I say this in a most humble manor
conspicuous silence.
Hey just when you check my logs on the 5/12/14 just watch out for the sivir .

This could be dangerous, but it would be curious to see how I am seen from another's perspective.
Seeing as I normally play with IRL friends, I have an idea my chat is probably interesting to read. Although I imagine I get caught up in arguments alot...
I would enjoy a check but wont be disapointed if you cant. Would'nt be too surprised if my results are bad.
LOL do me, %%%% could get interesting really fast. I'm sometimes a little toxic, but only if players are being %%%%s. I'm generally pretty good.

I feel neglected :(

I was honestly curious because i never received my santa baron icon all those Christmas' ago  and yet i was never punished/warned etc.
OMG I'll probably be smited! Please post some I'm generally quiet in games and think I'd probably be more neutral than positive.
I would love it if you checked mine, I think I am a pretty positive player ;P
Am I getting candy or coal for christmas santa?
Why not both?
Sure i'd love to see how riot sees me, i know i get mad sometimes but then sometimes i feel like i'm keeping my team from murdering each other
Do me because you will love it.
I wonder if i'm a positive player...?
Can't wait to find out :D
Can we see mine? Oh boy, not looking forward to this. :/
Oh boy, I can't wait to see all the positive things I've said in chat .
Let us reveal the truth. Am I positive? :)
Lets see how toxic I am, I feel as I'm starting to turn over a new leaf attitude-wise, or maybe thats because I've stopped playing Azir, either way, it'd be interesting to see how this pans out.

I feel like trying this out. 
Hoping that I haven't been toxic
I want to see mine! :)

I hope I'm positive. Fire away!

TBH I'm really interested in what the player behaviour system thinks of me. I love trashtalking and trolling, but I always do it in a friendly way.

I have a ribbon, so I guess it can't be THAT bad.
It would be nice if you guys could see whether I am being really nice or not. I don't actually know myself. O_O
